labels.remember_these_words: Remember these words. They will stay the same on this device unless it has been tampered.

labels.top_title: Would you like to generate new wallet seed?
labels.middle_help: Generating a new random seed allows creating an infinite number of wallets. All these wallets will be entirely determined by the seed phrase that must be kept highly secret. Please backup the seed phrase in a safe place to regain control over your assets if this device is damaged or lost.
